metadata.title: CVE-2019-19308 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In text_to_glyphs in sushi-font-widget.c in gnome-font-viewer 3.34.0, thereis a NULL pointer dereference while parsing a TTF font file that lacks aname section (due to a g_strconcat call that returns NULL).

criterions.comment: gnome-font-viewer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
gnome-sushi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
